name: Organic Hot Oil Blend
description:
A unique blend of organic oils used to oil your scalp, as a hot oil treatment, & to seal your ends








Suggested Use: Distribute evenly throughout damp hair that has been freshly washed & conditioned for use as a hot oil treatment by warming bottle in a cup of hot water (not boiling) with a warm towel or sit under a hooded/bonnet dryer for at least 15 minutes with or without clear wrap.  Also great for oiling & everyday protective styles to seal moisture into the ends of your hair.

name: Citrus Conditioning Gel
description:
An all-natural oil & fruit-based styling gel that provides silky curl definition with an amazing hold!  Use in conjunction with any Honeysuckle products.





Suggested Use: Apply to hair as needed to smooth flyaways, scrunch & define natural curl patterns, and achieve sleek ponytails or updos.

name: Coconut Hair Milk
description:
This light moisturizing crème has a milky consistency with a Coconut Oil base gently mixed with other natural ingredients. Works great as a leave-in conditioner after a fresh shampoo for scrunching curls with wash-n-go styles and also as a deep conditioning treatment & for detangling.​





Suggested Use: Shake vigorously. Apply a small amount onto hair as needed for ponytails, wash-n-go styling, detangling, & deep conditioning.

name: Citrus Leave-in Spray
description:
8 oz refreshing & energizing conditioning spray used to detangle, hydrate, moisturize, and revive curls




Suggested Use: Shake vigorously. Saturate hair as needed or apply directly onto scalp to relieve dryness & itching. Use to refresh wash-n-go styles, hydrate dry curls, detangle prior to styling and prior to sealing ends with oil. Works great on natural hair for braid-outs, twist-outs, and roller setting.

name: Buttercrème Hair & Body Whip
description:
This thick & creamy butter is great for moisturizing & smoothing any hairstyle. Works great on children’s hair. It has an Organic Shea Butter base and is infused with citrus extracts for a lovely, sweet fragrance





**Also great as a moisturizing body butter





Suggested Use: Soften cream by rubbing in palms of hands. Distribute cream throughout hair or directly onto scalp as needed. Use to smooth edges and ends and also on sectioned hair for roller setting, braiding, etc.  Also great for stretch marks, blemishes, dry skin, etc.
